title: Synthesis of dendrimer stabilized high-density silver nanoparticles on reduced graphene oxide for the catalytic and antibacterial properties

Immobilization of metal nanoparticles (MNPs) with high density on solid support is a crucial approach for their facile recovery and to counter aggregation problem. We have developed a simple technique...
